name: dialoger
description: A minimal JS/CSS library for custom alerts, confirmations, modals and toasts.
author: Puffanee

scripts.build:js: concat -o dist/dialoger.js src/toast.js src/modal.js src/confirm.js && uglifyjs dist/dialoger.js -o dist/dialoger.min.js
scripts.build:css: powershell -Command Copy-Item src/dialoger.css dist\ && cleancss -o dist/dialoger.min.css src/dialoger.css
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css
